page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: The block is traversed by the A2 which follows the course of the Roman Road. This road divides the block into two distinct areas.To the south lies mainly farmland served by the villages of Betsham and Southfleet.To the north east there is a residential zone which forms the south-west sector of Gravesend.New housing development has spread outwards towards the A2 and a new industrial estate on the outskirts of the residential zone is hoped to bring new jobs to the area.Within the residential zone there are public and other community services and local shopping parades.The north-west sector of the block incorporates part of Swanscombe and is dominated by old chalk quarries and present day workings,here the land is more open. The community is mixed and includes all age groups and the Indian minority
